explanation: To determine whether UT_GetStubCount participates in a recursion cycle you must inspect the body of UT_GetStubEntry (the only function it calls). If UT_GetStubEntry itself calls (directly or indirectly) UT_GetStubCount, that would create an indirect recursion. The static call graph shows UT_GetStubEntry has no callees, so no other function definitions are required—however, if UT_GetStubEntry uses function pointers or macros that invoke other functions, those target symbols would also need to be inspected for transitive calls back to UT_GetStubCount.
